1.content: Every interactive needs a starting point, so first off, how will the guys grow?
1.title: Let's start with the BIG decision

choices: Athletes bulking up in the off season
Old buddies hanging out on the weekends
11.content: What is the scenario behind the gains?
11.title: Blimping Baddies

112.content:
It's been 20 years since Jonas, Liam, Derek, and Ty had graduate high school. The four had been inseparable in school but had drifted apart after graduation, they had kept in contact, pairs meeting up over the years but all four never being in the same place.
         Until now. Their 20 year high school reunion.
         None of them knew what to expect from this. For the first time since Ty joined the military fresh out of high school, they were all living in the same town but Derek, the last to return, had not had a chance to meet up again until that night.
         "Liam! It's great to see you! The gang's back together as of tonight!" Jonas cheered as they grabbed their name tags and giving his old friend a hug.
         "It's great to see you too Jonas." Liam groaned, not returning the hug. He'd always hated Jonas's touchy-feely nature. It drove him nuts since he didn't even like bumping into people by accident. It wasn't even until his fifth date with his wife that he'd finally steeled himself up enough to kiss her.
         "Jonas! Liam! Is Derek here yet?" Ty joined the others to grab his name tag which he promptly stuffed into his dress uniform's pocket so he wouldn't be out of uniform.
         Liam rolled his eyes. "Really Ty? Your dress uniform? You realize it's been years since you wore that right? You at least could have gotten it fitted." He glanced at Ty's gut that bulged some, straining the buttons just a tiny bit.
         "Like you're one to talk!" He poked Liam's much more pronounced gut that was amplified by his tailored suit.
         "Yeah, but I didn't join a career that requires physical perfection."
         "Hey. The military doesn't require perfection, just some degree of human fitness."
         "Yeah, yeah. Anyone know when Derek is supposed to get here?" Jonas interrupted.
         "Right now!" He jumped onto Jonas's back.
         "Get off you monkey! You weigh a ton!"
         "I'm the monkey and yet your the ones wearing monkey suits!" He laughed. Ty chuckled. Out of all of them, only Derek, in his own fashion, hadn't worn some sort of suit, instead opting for jeans and a t-shirt. "So what have you guys been up to over the years?"
         "Military, obviously."
         "CPA." Liam stated.
         "Teacher and coach at the high school." Jonas informed. "And what about you? None of us have any idea what you've been up to for years. Even Ty came around more often than you. And he was in the military."
         "Actually, I was acting."
         "Acting? You? You hated drama class in school."
         "No, you just thought I did. You remember all those "band practices" and "out of town gigs" I went to? Play rehearsals."
         "What? Seriously? You kept that from us all this time? Why didn't you tell us?" Ty demanded.
         "You guys only thought the arts were good for getting girls. I wasn't interested in that. I just wanted to express myself."
         "Dude! You knew you could tell us anything. We're practically family." Jonas told him, putting an arm around his shoulder.
         "Yeah, I know. Now let's go party!"
         Everyone cheered and headed into the gym to party through the night until they all had to get home in the morning.

         Now you get to decide who's going to be followed as the pounds start packing on, all the guys are 38 except Derek who's 39:

         Ty- 6'3", 229 pounds.
                   Mostly muscular with some fat creeping onto his gut
                   Retired from the military four years ago, now a manager at the local super market as well as a volunteer fire fighter
                   Single but ready to settle down

         Liam- 5'11", 236 pounds
                   Chubby all over
                    CPA
                   Married with one son
                   severely dislikes physical contact

         Jonas- 6', 199 pounds
                   Skinny with a slight starter gut
                   High school geometry teacher as well as the baseball coach
                   Single, looking to adopt

         Derek- 5'9", 186 pounds
                   Muscular, very athletic
                   Former actor, mainly a backup dancer. Looking for work in their hometown
                   Married to a guy though no one in the area knows he gay, he's ready to come out
                   No longer wants to dance and is ready to let himself go. Maybe his husband wants to help?

         Or perhaps there's a fifth person in their group that wasn't mentioned?
112.title: High School Reunion

113.content:
Who will be the contestants in this gaining contest?

College friends Ben, Frank, Henry, and Todd who want to to make the most of their college meal plans.

Construction workers Drake, Jonathan, David, Samson, and Link, who can never let any of the others best themselves at anything.

Chefs Nathan and Washington compete to fatten up Dominick and Patrick to once and for all prove who is the better chef.

Stuart and Matthew are to fight in a magic duel where the stronger a spell is, the more fat it drains. Who can gain more and cast the stronger spell?

Or are none of these contests fattening enough?
113.title: Gaining contest

12.content: What is the scenario behind these muscular mutants's growth?
12.title: Muscle Mountains

14.content: So one type of growth wasn't enough? You want them to grow in multiple ways? Well aren't you greedy?
14.title: HUGE mistakes

choices: Working out but hell no to diets!
143.content: What is this contradiction? Muscle AND Fat? Goodness will these guys be round! Or are different guys gaining in different ways? The choice is yours.
143.title: Powerlifters are us

info.brief_description: This is a male GROUP focused interactive.
info.description:
These men can have known each other for years or maybe they just met. Either way, knowing each other will lead to BIG changes! Will these changes be from friendly dinners leading to larger waist, rivals in the gym seeking unfair advantages to more gains, or maybe it's strangers that just met because of a shared curse that's making them grow taller.

Good grammar would be preferable but I know some people don't speak English that well so just do your best.

No toilet stuff, vore, or death please.
Shrinking is allowed but no smaller than they started.
Relationships are fine, gay or straight, doesn't matter, just please don't go overboard on bedroom references please.

Good story line chapters will be awarded points.
